duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate equipment and perform support tasks to manufacture pharmaceuticals within a state-of-the-art facility.
Assist in process support and continuous improvement activities in a regulated cGMP environment.
Maintain proper documentation and ensure quality standards throughout the manufacturing process.
Provide support during audits and with audit observation closure.
Employ automated systems, enterprise systems, and available technology to execute work.
Maintain cross-functional communication with technology transfer teams, lab scientists, supply chain, quality and engineering as necessary.

education_certification.credential: High school diploma with a minimum of 3 years manufacturing or pharmaceutical experience -OR- Associates degree with a minimum of 2 years of industry experience -OR- Bachelor’s Degree
